eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.manager.ingested.spatial

Class LocationReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.manager.ingested.spatial.LocationReader

  • public class LocationReader
extends Object
    Consumes data from a CSV file and extracts location values from two specific attributes. Locations (as geometries) are maintained in a hash table taking their keys from another attribute in the file. An R-tree index may be created from the collected (key,location) pairs.

        Parameters:
        wkt - WKT of the geometry.
        Returns:

      • LonLat2Geometry

        public org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry LonLat2Geometry(double lon,
                                                          double lat)
        Provides a binary geometry representation from the given WGS84 lon/lat geographical coordinates.
        Parameters:
        lon - A double value representing the longitude of the location.
        lat - A double value representing the latitude of the location.
        Returns:
        The geometry representation (in WGS84) of the given location.

      • buildIndex

        public RTree<String,Location> buildIndex(Map<String,org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry> targetData,
                                         Logger log)
        Creates an R-tree index from the input collection of geometry locations.
        Parameters:
        targetData - A dictionary of all geometries with their unique identifiers as keys.
        log - Handle to the logger of statistics calculated over the data.
        Returns:
        The R-tree index created over the input geometries.

      • importFromCsvFile

        public HashMap<String,org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry> importFromCsvFile(String inputFile,
                                                                            int maxLines,
                                                                            int colKey,
                                                                            int colValue,
                                                                            String columnDelimiter,
                                                                            boolean header,
                                                                            Logger log)
        Creates a dictionary of (key,geometry) pairs of all items read from a CSV file. ASSUMPTION: Input data collection only contains POINT locations referenced in WGS84.
        Parameters:
        inputFile - Path to the input CSV file or its URL at a remote server containing the attribute data.
        maxLines - Instructs reader to only consume the first lines up to this limit.
        colKey - An integer representing the ordinal number of the attribute containing the key of the entities.
        colValue - An integer representing the ordinal number of the attribute containing the values (i.e., geometries) of the entities.
        columnDelimiter - The delimiter character used between attribute values in the CSV file.
        header - Boolean indicating whether the first line contains attribute names.
        log - Handle to the logger for statistics and issues over the input data.
        Returns:
        A hash map of (key,geometry) values.

      • importFromJdbcTable

        public HashMap<String,org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry> importFromJdbcTable(String tableName,
                                                                              String keyColumnName,
                                                                              String longitudeColumnName,
                                                                              String latitudeColumnName,
                                                                              JdbcConnector jdbcConnector,
                                                                              Logger log)
        Reading spatial attribute data (POINT locations only) from a table in a dBMS over a JDBC connection.
        Parameters:
        tableName - The name of the table (or view) that contains the input data.
        keyColumnName - The name of the attribute containing the unique identifier (key) of the entities.
        longitudeColumnName - The name of the attribute containing the longitude ordinate of the entities.
        latitudeColumnName - The name of the attribute containing the latitude ordinate of the entities.
        jdbcConnector - Instance of a JDBC connector to the DBMS where the table resides.
        log - Logger for statistics and issues over the input data.
        Returns:
        A hash map of (key,geometry) values.

      • importFromJdbcTable

        public HashMap<String,org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry> importFromJdbcTable(String tableName,
                                                                              String keyColumnName,
                                                                              String geometryColumnName,
                                                                              JdbcConnector jdbcConnector,
                                                                              Logger log)
        Reading spatial attribute data (POINT locations only) from a table in a dBMS over a JDBC connection.
        Parameters:
        tableName - The name of the table (or view) that contains the input data.
        keyColumnName - The name of the attribute containing the unique identifier (key) of the entities.
        geometryColumnName - The name of the attribute containing the geometry of the entities.
        jdbcConnector - Instance of a JDBC connector to the DBMS where the table resides.
        log - Logger for statistics and issues over the input data.
        Returns:
        A hash map of (key,geometry) values.

      • importFromCsvFile

        public HashMap<String,org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry> importFromCsvFile(String inputFile,
                                                                            int maxLines,
                                                                            int colKey,
                                                                            int colLongitude,
                                                                            int colLatitude,
                                                                            String columnDelimiter,
                                                                            boolean header,
                                                                            Logger log)
        Creates a dictionary of (key,geometry) pairs of all items read from a CSV file ASSUMPTION: Input data collection only contains POINT locations referenced in WGS84.
        Parameters:
        inputFile - Path to the input CSV file or its URL at a remote server containing the attribute data.
        maxLines - Instructs reader to only consume the first lines up to this limit.
        colKey - An integer representing the ordinal number of the attribute containing the key of the entities.
        colLongitude - An integer representing the ordinal number of the attribute containing the longitude ordinates of the entities.
        colLatitude - An integer representing the ordinal number of the attribute containing the latitude ordinates of the entities.
        columnDelimiter - The delimiter character used between attribute values in the CSV file.
        header - Boolean indicating whether the first line contains attribute names.
        log - Logger for statistics and issues over the input data.
        Returns:
        A hash map of (key,geometry) values.
